verbs.description: [V: Bashing] [ARG1: the leader of one of America ’s venerable allies] , [ARG0: the White House] escalated its trade tirade and leveled more withering and unprecedented criticism Sunday against Canada ’s prime minister , branding Justin Trudeau a back - stabber unworthy of President Donald Trump ’s time .
